title: Always-Open Business Hours and Higher-Contrast Logo in Header/Footer

requirements.summary: Replace the Business Hours day-by-day schedule in the Contact section with a single “Always Open” status line.
acceptanceCriteria: On the Contact section, the Business Hours card no longer shows Monday–Sunday rows.
The Business Hours card shows the text “Always Open” as the only hours/status line.
All user-facing text is in English.

file_operations.description: Update the Business Hours card UI to remove the current multi-row schedule and display a single, user-facing English line that reads “Always Open” as the only hours/status line.

requirements.summary: Improve logo visibility in header and footer using styling adjustments while keeping the same logo asset path and preserving aspect ratio.
acceptanceCriteria: The logo remains loaded from /assets/generated/patil-logo.dim_512x512.png in both header and footer.
In both header and footer, the logo has sufficient contrast against the surrounding background (light and dark themes) and is visually clear (not washed out or blending into the background).
Logo maintains aspect ratio and is not distorted.

file_operations.description: Create a small reusable LogoMark component that renders the existing logo image from /assets/generated/patil-logo.dim_512x512.png with consistent sizing (object-contain / w-auto) and a contrast-enhancing wrapper (e.g., background + padding + subtle ring/shadow) designed to work in both light and dark themes.
Replace the direct logo usage with the new LogoMark component so the header logo gains improved contrast/visibility while keeping the same asset path and preserving aspect ratio.
Replace the direct logo usage with the new LogoMark component so the footer logo gains improved contrast/visibility while keeping the same asset path and preserving aspect ratio.
